text: O vy, yaki uviruvaly! Ne otochuyte sebe tymy, khto ne z-posered vas. Vony ne vtratyat聞 nahody nashkodyty vam ta poradity trudnoshcham vashym. Nenavyst聞 vydno na vustakh yikhnikh, ale shche bil聞sha nenavyst聞 zakhovana v yikhnikh sertsyakh! My vzhe poyasnyly vam znamennya, yakby zh lyshe rozumily vy
